attributes.action: ALLOW PENSIONERS A MONTHLY FUEL VOUCHER.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IN ORDER FOR THEM TO BE ABLE TO KEEP IN TOUCH WITH FAMILY AND FRIENDS.
Proof of entitlement could be on presentation of vehicle registration document together with drivers' photocard licence.One voucher to equal not more than 40 litres at 25 pence a litre.

rejection.details: This petition is fine. You just need to address the excessive use of capital letters, they make the text hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
